description: As users enter their information in TurboTax Canada 2023, they save their progress as TT23 files. This allows them to close and resume work on their return, make changes, and submit it electronically or by mail. They may also use the files to back up tax data to prevent loss or transfer 2023 tax information into TurboTax Canada 2024 to prefill the return for the next year.
When saving a tax return with TurboTax Canada 2023 for the first time, the software creates the TT23 file in the following location:
Also, TurboTax Canada uses file extensions for tax returns that correlate with the tax year. For example, .TT22 is for 2022.
NOTE: TT23 files are similar to .TAX2023 files, which the U.S. version of TurboTax 2023 uses to save tax returns.
